articles.title: $500,000 in 48 Hours: The Handy 2 Shatters Kickstarter Expectations
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Ohdoki launched The Handy 2 and The Handy 2 Pro on Kickstarter, securing the #1 spot on launch day after raising $500,000 in 48 hours. These interactive strokers for men feature upgrades like a built-in battery, ClickOn system, and a next-gen motor, and are available for pre-order on Kickstarter with a retail launch planned for later in 2025.

articles.title: 43 Swaps For Pricier Items If You Love Saving Money
articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.summary: E.l.f. Cosmetics launched Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen with SPF 35, featuring a clear gel formula for smooth, lightweight application, doubling as a blurring primer. E.l.f. also introduced Camo Liquid Blush, celebrated for its lasting pigmentation. Additionally, E.l.f. Cosmetics released a tubing mascara utilizing tubing technology and jojoba seed oil to extend and condition lashes.

articles.title: Soap made with Sydney Sweeney's used bathwater exists
articles.author: Christie D'Zurilla
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch, a boutique soap company, launched a limited-edition soap product called "Sydney's Bathwater Bliss." The product's creation was prompted by consumer demand following Sydney Sweeney's advertisement for the company. The soap is said to smell like the Pacific Northwest.

articles.title: SAQ to bring alcohol products to grocery store shelves
articles.author: Swidda Rassy
articles.summary: The SAQ is launching a new pilot project. This project allows select grocery stores and convenience stores across Quebec to sell some of SAQ's products.

articles.title: ElevenLabs debuts Conversational AI 2.0 voice assistants that understand when to pause, speak, and take turns talking
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: ElevenLabs has launched Conversational AI 2.0, an upgraded platform for building advanced voice agents for enterprise use, featuring a state-of-the-art turn-taking model, integrated language detection for multilingual support, and a built-in Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system. This new version aims to provide more natural, intelligent, and secure interactions for applications like customer support and call centers.

articles.title: Grindr's new Right Now feature brings a spicy live feed to the hookup app
articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
articles.summary: Grindr has launched Right Now, a social media-like live feed feature, after a successful pilot test. Grindr also introduced A-List, an AI-powered tool for chat summarization and Wingman, a generative AI assistant, which are part of Grindr's effort to boost revenue and make users see the app as 'the Global Gayborhood in Your Pocket™.'

articles.title: Samsung reimagines TV at home with new AI-powered screens
articles.author: Inquirer.Net Brandroom
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 AI TV lineup featuring Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED, QLED, Samsung OLED, and The Frame models, powered by Samsung Vision AI. The new TVs include features such as the NQ8 AI Gen3 Processor for upscaling content, anti-glare technology, and enhanced color accuracy with real quantum dot technology. Pre-orders are available until June 30, 2025.

articles.title: New Flawless Summer Skin Must-Have 2025 Beauty Launches
articles.author: Victor Qunnuell Vaughns Jr
articles.summary: Murad launched Biome-Balancing Clear & Prevent Acne Treatment Serum, while Bloomeffects introduced Tulipscreen Hydrating Lip Oil. Makeup By Mario released SoftSculpt Blurring Bronzer, and Naturium launched The Revealer Sulfur Body Wash. Furthermore, MERIT introduced The Uniform Tinted Mineral Sunscreen SPF 45, Sol de Janeiro launched Glowmotions Glow Oil Carnaval Queen, Glossier launched Lip Glaze, ONE/SIZE launched Powder Melt Glass Setting Spray and Herbivore launched TREMELLA Silky Hydration Gel Cream.

articles.title: Dreame X50 Ultra Robot Vacuum
articles.author: Uncrate
articles.summary: Dreame introduced the X50, a robot vacuum and mop hybrid featuring AI RGB cameras, 3D sensors for precise mapping, obstacle avoidance, and motorized legs for climbing. The X50 offers 20,000Pa of suction, a runtime of up to 220 minutes, and full voice assistant integration.

articles.title: GameSir's $30 Nova 2 Lite controller includes Hall effect sticks and triggers.
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: GameSir is offering the Nova 2 Lite controller for $29.99 as a solid alternative to 8BitDo's Ultimate 2C. The Nova 2 Lite features Hall effect joysticks, triggers adjustable for FPS games, remappable back buttons, and compatibility with Switch, PCs, iOS, and Android devices.

articles.title: 'Trump burger' gets scathing reviews from food critics: 'Consistent in blandness'
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Trump Burger opened a new location in Houston on May 9, offering menu items like the Trump Cheeseburger and Trump Tower burger. The restaurant also features the satirical 'Biden Burger.' Customer reviews are mixed, with some praising the food while others describe it as bland.

articles.title: SAMBAZON® Brings the Alegria to Life with Vibrant Experiential Pop-Up in San Diego -- Thousands of Fans, Influencers, and Athletes Join the Celebration; Açaí Bowls, Smoothies, and Exclusive Merch Take Center Stage at Malibu Farm, Seaport Village
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: SAMBAZON launched its first Experiential Pop-Up Activation called Taste the Alegria in Southern California. During the event, SAMBAZON provided attendees with a sneak peek at the brand's newest product launch: All-In-One, Ready-to-Serve Açai & Smoothie bowls designed for convenient, on-the-go superfood nourishment.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney is selling soap that contains her actual bathwater
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch launched 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss,' a soap co-created with actress Sydney Sweeney. The soap's scent blends pine, Douglas fir, and earthy moss with a touch of Sydney Sweeney's bathwater. The product's description highlights a combination of the outdoors and Sydney Sweeney's bathtub, featuring sand, sea salt, and shea butter.

articles.title: Yumz Lemon Cake Sativa THC Disposable Vape Review: Are You Too Yellow to Try This One?
articles.author: Veronica Booth
articles.summary: Yumz has launched the Lemon Cake Sativa THC Disposable Vape, a product containing Delta-9 THC, THCa, and THC-P and containing 6 grams of juice. Additionally, Yumz provides the Tigers Blood + Watermelon Kush Indica THC Disposable Vape and Honey Berry Hybrid THC Disposable Vape.

articles.title: Ben je wakker? 'Right Now' van Grindr gaat Global
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Grindr launched Right Now, a new intent-based feature. The feature aims to connect users seeking immediate encounters. This launch occurred globally and targets Grindr's 14.6 million monthly active users.

articles.title: 5 Father's Day Gifts That Are Sure To Impress and Won't Break the Bank
articles.author: Rachel McCarson
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a drone with a 1080p HD camera and auto start/land technology. Ninja has released the Creami NC300, an appliance that turns almost anything into ice cream. Garmin's mini dash cam records 1080p HD video and uses voice control.

articles.title: Angular v20 arrives with eyes on generative AI development
articles.author: Info World
articles.summary: Google's Angular v20 is now available, stabilizing APIs and features such as incremental hydration. The new version promotes Zoneless to developer preview and improves debugging capabilities.

articles.title: 32 Things You Can Buy Because You're An Adult And Make Your Own Decisions
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The content introduces several new products, including a Lego cherry blossom kit for build-it-yourself decor, Skin1004 Zombie Pack designed to hydrate skin, and cowboy straw toppers to personalize water bottles. It also mentioned Meowijuana catnip joints for cats.

articles.title: Soap made with Sydney Sweeney's used bathwater exists and now we feel so dirty
articles.author: Christie D’Zurilla
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch launched 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss,' a limited-edition soap product. This new product release was prompted by consumer demand after Sydney Sweeney's viral advertisement for the company in October.

articles.title: Moto G86 Power 5G: Huge 6720mAh Battery
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Motorola launched three new G-Series smartphones: Moto G86 5G Power, Moto G86 5G, and Moto G56 5G. The Moto G86 5G Power features a 6720mAh battery, while the Moto G86 5G offers a balanced experience, and the Moto G56 5G provides affordable 5G connectivity.

articles.title: Soap made with Sydney Sweeney's used bathwater exists and now we feel so dirty
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch launched a limited-edition soap product called 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss'. The product is said to smell like the Pacific Northwest. The company claims it created the soap due to popular demand.

articles.title: One Deal, Twice the Joy: Discover the Nexus Eid Special Promo
articles.author: Bellanaija
articles.summary: Nexus Appliances introduced the "Eid Special Promo". The promotion aims to provide customers a deal.

articles.title: Opening date revealed for Newbie store in Windsor Yards
articles.author: Anaka Nair
articles.summary: Swedish brand Newbie has opened a new store in Windsor, offering clothing for babies, children, and women. The store will feature Newbie's clothing collections made of organic cotton and RWS-certified wool. Exclusive offers will be available during the opening weekend.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney's bathwater soap isn't the empowering move she thinks it is
articles.author: Debbie Stowe
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch extended their tie-in with Sydney Sweeney to create a new soap product based on her bathwater due to overwhelming fan demand. Sydney Sweeney agreed to the collaboration, resulting in this new product launch by Dr. Squatch.

articles.title: Zippy's Upgrades Its Restaurant Digital Experience
articles.author: Mattos
articles.summary: Zippy's has launched a new digital ordering program including an updated app and order.zippys.com website. The update features a redesigned interface, improved order customization, and new ordering options, such as ordering breakfast items for the next day. Zippy's is also working on a custom cake ordering website for Napoleon's Bakery to allow customers to customize their cake orders.

articles.title: New Balance's ‘Most Comfortable Shoe' Is on Sale for as Much as 50% Off
articles.author: Rachel McCarson
articles.summary: Zappos is currently offering New Balance 997R shoes for as low as $50, which is 50% off the original retail price. This sale includes a deep discount on specific colorways like Sea Stone/Deep Ocean/Parchment, Sea Salt/Linen, and Concrete/Linen, with free standard shipping provided by Zappos.

articles.title: OLIVE YOUNG SUMMER SALE FOR INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS BEGINS  May. 30, 2025 15:47
articles.summary: CJ Olive Young has launched its 'OLIVE YOUNG SUMMER SALE' on its international mobile app and website, running from May 31 to June 6. The sale features discounts up to 77% on popular K-beauty products from brands like Anua, BIOHEAL BOH, and CLIO, with special offers like free shipping and welcome coupons for new customers.

articles.title: Russia unveils national messaging app to reduce reliance on WhatsApp, Telegram
articles.author: Alperen Aktas
org: State Duma Committee on Information Policy
articles.summary: Russia has launched a national messaging service as an alternative to foreign platforms like WhatsApp and Telegram. The domestic app aims to provide a secure and multifunctional digital ecosystem and to replace foreign messengers. This initiative is designed to enhance digital security and promote competition in the messaging space.

articles.title: Gym Mentor Announces Launch of Ultimate Gym System 1.0, Bringing AI Automation to Fitness Industry
articles.summary: Gym Mentor launched the Ultimate Gym System 1.0 (UGS 1.0), an AI-driven platform designed to automate gym operations. The platform combines AI-powered phone agents, marketing automation, and CRM workflows, providing an integrated solution for lead management, appointment booking, and client retention. This system helps gym owners reduce administrative workload and focus on member engagement and growth.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney Bathwater Soap: Price, Where to Buy and Why You Should Get It Before It Sells Out
articles.author: Marie Joy Toledo
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney has launched a new product: bathwater soap. This novelty soap, allegedly infused with water from the actress's bath, is marketed as a collector's item. The soap is rumored to be handcrafted with natural oils and botanical extracts, and is vegan and cruelty-free.

articles.title: dancemoon Reinvents Itself with Its First Bathroom Essential: the JustHang Squeegee
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: dancemoon is launching its first bathroom essential product, the JustHang Squeegee, on May 30th for pre-order in the US. The squeegee features a one-piece silicone blade, an ergonomic anti-slip handle, and an integrated storage design, and will be available globally in June.

articles.title: Fresh in Summer: NEXA Launches NEXA PIX! Cool Off This Summer with 3 Must-Do Essentials
articles.summary: NEXA is launching NEXA PIX, a new refreshment product featuring Juicy Lock technology. Juicy Lock ensures unparalleled freshness retention and leak-proof performance. The product is targeted towards consumers seeking refreshment during warm weather.

articles.title: GMTech Inc. Announces the Launch of NEW WEB3 Smartphone
articles.summary: GMTECH INC., through its subsidiary Shenggang Excellence Limited, has launched a new generation of Web3 native smart terminals. This device integrates DePIN, DID, and edge AI computing, featuring enhanced processor performance, node capacity, battery life, and ecological compatibility. The product is scheduled to launch in core markets in Asia and the Middle East.

articles.title: Dyson's popular pick V7 Advanced Cordless Vacuum is on sale for $170 off at this one location
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Dyson V7 Advanced Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is available at Walmart for $229.99, discounted from its original price of $399.99. This cordless vacuum features powerful suction, a de-tangling motorbar cleaner head, and a lightweight design, providing up to 30 minutes of continuous cleaning. It also easily converts to a handheld vacuum for versatile cleaning.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney faces serious backlash over bathwater soap: ‘Sexism at its worst'
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch, in collaboration with Sydney Sweeney, is launching a limited-edition soap called "Sydney's Bathwater Bliss," made with Sweeney's actual bathwater. The product will be available for sale from June 6, 2025.

articles.title: Sweet lovers go wild for NEW flavour of classic goodies on shelves at major supermarket
articles.author: Caron Mckinlay
articles.summary: Mars has launched a new Skittles flavor, Skittles Citrus, featuring Orange, Lemon, Lime, Mandarin, and Blood Orange flavors. The new Skittles flavor is available at big supermarkets, grocery stores and corner shops across the country. This marks the first Skittles flavor launch since Skittles Giants Gooey was released last year.

articles.title: Gutterpy Tents powered by Liquid Screen Design Joins NVBDC's MVO Task Force
articles.summary: Gutterpy Tents, after merging with Liquid Screen Design, expanded its marketing offerings. These new services include free graphic design with promotional product orders, Print-on-Demand (POD) stores, individualized fulfillment of orders, custom swag boxes, and physical marketing analysis. These services are intended to enhance branding and event solutions.

articles.title: 32 Products To Help Solve Annoying Problems
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: The content describes several newly available personal care products designed to address specific needs and improve hygiene or appearance. Products like Kojic Acid Dark Spot Remover Soap, sulfate-free biotin shampoo, and Veet's sensitive hair removal gel are highlighted for their unique formulations and benefits in areas such as skin brightening, hair thickening, and hair removal. Additionally, items like the Squatty Potty and various cleaning tools are featured for their innovative approaches to personal care.

articles.title: No7 Deserves More Hype & These 6 Editor Favourites Prove Why
articles.author: Karina Hoshikawa
articles.summary: No7 focuses on providing effective and affordable beauty products, with most items priced under £35 and bundles capped at £55. The brand offers a range of serums, moisturisers, and a mascara that competes with luxury brands.

articles.title: Keep your home safe and save 50% off the Blink Video Doorbell
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Blink Video Doorbell + Sync Module 2 at a discounted price. This DIY-friendly home security solution features 1080p HD video, two-way audio, motion alerts, local storage via Sync Module 2, and Alexa compatibility.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Slim and sleek, but not for everyone
articles.author: Rich De Muro
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, an ultraslim smartphone featuring a Snapdragon chip, 12GB RAM, and a bright screen. The phone, available now, has a dual-lens camera, fast charging, and starts at $1100 for the 256GB model.

articles.title: Best MicroSD Express Cards for Nintendo Switch 2 You Can Buy Before the Switch 2 Actually Launches
articles.author: James Bricknell
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Switch 2 console on June 5th, requiring a microSD Express card for expanded memory. PNY and GameStop are releasing new microSD Express cards specifically designed for the Switch 2, with GameStop offering a pre-order discount on their card which will launch alongside the console on June 5, 2025.

articles.title: BYD launches Bangladesh's first plug-in hybrid EV with exclusive customer delivery ceremony
articles.author: Anniversary Issue-I
articles.summary: CG Runner BD Limited, the official distributor of BYD vehicles in Bangladesh, unveiled the BYD Sealion 6, a new DM-i Super Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicle (PHEV), at a customer delivery ceremony. The BYD Sealion 6 combines electric driving with a traditional fuel engine and is noted for its fuel efficiency and features. The event showcased the company's commitment to sustainable transportation and automotive innovation in the Bangladeshi market.

articles.title: PerfectVape Expands Its Product Line with Smart Disposable Vapes Offering Advanced Features
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: PerfectVape has introduced "smart" disposable vapes featuring screen displays for battery and e-liquid levels, adjustable airflow, and optimized coils. These pre-filled and pre-charged devices offer a range of flavors and aim to provide an enhanced vaping experience.

articles.title: Fine living  The laptop you didn't know you need
articles.summary: ASUS is launching the Vivobook 16 (X1607QA) laptop. The laptop features Qualcomm's new Snapdragon X platform and promises long battery life and solid everyday performance with an MRP of `84,990.

articles.title: Navitas Semiconductor to Participate in Upcoming Investor Events
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Global-e is offering Global-e Direct, Global-e Complete, and Cross-Border Returns solutions. These new product offerings enhance cross-border e-commerce by providing localized shopping experiences and streamlined returns. These platforms aim to simplify international sales and improve customer satisfaction.

articles.title: up to 50% off must-have products
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Boots is offering discounts up to 50% off on various products during their Super Sunday Savings event on June 1st. The promotion includes brands like Estée Lauder, No7, Oral-B, and Therabody, with discounts on items like skincare, fragrances, and oral care products. The offers are available online at boots.com for 24 hours only.

articles.title: up to 50% off must-have products
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Boots is launching its "Super Sunday Savings" event on June 1st, offering discounts of up to 50% on products from brands like Estée Lauder, No7, and Oral-B. The event will be online only at boots.com for 24 hours.

articles.title: 'This unusual dry shampoo kept my greasy hair looking clean for four days'
articles.author: Laura Mulley
articles.summary: K18 launched AirWash Dry Shampoo, priced at £48 (currently £38.40 on Face the Future), with technology to lift odors and absorb oil without residue. Reviewer Laura Mulley found that using K18's AirWash, she was able to go four days without washing her hair, instead of her usual two.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 Price In India, Launch Date, Design, Color Options, Camera, Specifications And More: All We Know So Far
articles.author: Shubham Arora
articles.summary: OnePlus is anticipated to launch the OnePlus Nord 5 in India around June or July 2025, potentially as a rebadged OnePlus Ace 5 Ultra. The phone is expected to have a 6.83-inch OLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ processor, up to 16GB RAM, 1TB storage, a 50MP dual rear camera, and a 6,700mAh battery with 100W fast charging, with a price range between Rs 30,000 and Rs 35,000.

articles.title: Amazon restocks Nintendo Switch 2 pre-orders less than a week before launch
articles.author: Liam Martin
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the Nintendo Switch 2 console on June 5, along with games like Mario Kart World. Enhanced versions of existing Switch games, including upgraded editions of Breath of the Wild and Tears of the Kingdom, will also be released with new features like companion apps.

articles.title: NxtQuantum's AI+ Smartphone To Launch on Flipkart with a Bold Made-in-India Vision
articles.author: Naman Bansal
articles.summary: NxtQuantum Shift Technologies, led by Madhav Sheth, has launched the AI+ smartphone, which will be available on Flipkart at the end of June 2025. This 'designed and made in India' smartphone integrates a homegrown user interface, localized software, and indigenously built hardware with a focus on user privacy and security. Flipkart is playing a key role in making the AI+ smartphone accessible to millions of Indians through affordability programs.

articles.title: Business News  Make Monsoon Laundry Hassle-Free: Shop Washing Machines on Easy EMIs with Bajaj Finserv
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Bajaj Finserv is offering Easy EMI options with attractive deals and zero down payment for washing machines on Bajaj Mall from top brands like LG, Samsung, IFB, Whirlpool, and Bosch. Customers can compare models online and then purchase in-store with convenient repayment options to make laundry hassle-free during the monsoon season.

articles.title: My Mum Made It discount codes for May 2025
articles.author: Shona Moreland
articles.summary: My Mum Made It offers free express delivery on orders over $200 and provides a 10% discount code upon newsletter sign-up. Additionally, they offer a refer-a-friend program where both the referrer and the referred friend receive $20 off vouchers and a sale section with discounts up to 20% off on various products.

articles.title: Monsoon Laundry Made Easy: Upgrade to Smart Washing Machines with Bajaj Finserv
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Bajaj Finserv is offering a range of washing machines from brands like LG, Samsung, and Whirlpool. These machines are available on Easy EMIs and with zero down payment, providing a solution to laundry challenges during the monsoon season.

articles.title: Would you bathe in Sydney Sweeney's bathwater? The H! Fashion team weighs in
articles.author: Lauren Ramsay
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch is launching a limited-edition soap called "Sydney's Bathwater Bliss" made with Sydney Sweeney's bathwater. The product was announced on Instagram and will be available on 6/6/25 at drsquatch.com.

articles.title: Surprise sale slashes cordless Dyson V11 price with £100 freebie
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a promotional price and a free Floor Dok with the V11 Advanced vacuum cleaner, which features an LED screen and a one-hour run time. Shark's PowerPro Cordless Stick Vacuum is also on sale. The Henry Reach vacuum cleaner is also offered at discounted price.

articles.title: This phone is under £300 and has a bigger battery than any flagship
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Motorola is launching three new smartphones: the Moto G86 Power (£300), Moto G86 5G (£280), and Moto G56 5G (£200, £220 for business edition). The Moto G86 Power features a 6720mAh battery, while the other two models have 5200mAh batteries. All three offer water and drop resistance, and will be available from Amazon, EE, Curry's, and Motorola in the UK.

articles.title: Gu Cake Pots now available in HelloFresh orders
articles.author: Neil Shaw
articles.summary: Dessert brand Gü has launched a new Cake Pot range, featuring chilled, sponge-based desserts. HelloFresh customers can order Gü's new Victoria Sponge Cake Pot starting from June 2. The Cake Pots, costing £3.75 for 2 portions, will be available alongside their weekly meals.

articles.title: Nykaa Q4 Results: Profit jumps nearly three-fold YoY to ₹20 crore; GMV rises 27% YoY
articles.author: Nishant Kumar
articles.summary: Nykaa launched a record number of iconic global beauty brands in the last 12 months. These partnerships include brands such as Yves Saint Laurent, NARS, Kerastase, Eucerin, GHD, Armani beauty, Supergoop and Nexxus.

articles.title: Samsung's AI-Powered TVs: A Home Entertainment Revolution – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 AI TV lineup, incorporating Vision AI technology to enhance personalized home entertainment experiences. The new TVs include models like Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED, QLED, Samsung OLED, and The Frame, each offering unique features such as AI-powered picture and sound, 8K upscaling, and seamless smart home integration. Customers can pre-order these TVs until June 30, 2025, with opportunities for savings and exclusive freebies.

articles.title: These might be the smartest glasses I've seen – but all they do is help you see better
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: IXI is launching smart glasses featuring lenses that adjust in real time based on eye-tracking, providing sharp vision at any distance without overt technological signs. The product is designed to address vision problems with advanced features like auto-tuning optics and posture feedback, although pricing and availability are yet to be announced; a waitlist is available.

articles.title: BYD Officially Debuts in Cyprus at Glamorous Old GSP Square Event
articles.author: Bdigital Web Solutions
articles.summary: BYD, in partnership with Alpan Group, launched its electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles in Cyprus, introducing models like the ATTO 3, SEAL, SEAL U DM-i, and SEALION 7. This launch signifies BYD's expansion in Europe and its commitment to providing sustainable technologies, with the vehicles featuring advanced technologies and innovative designs.

articles.title: The $13 Dryer Balls Reviewers Say Made Them Ditch Potentially Harmful Dryer Sheets
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: Wool dryer balls, made with high-quality New Zealand wool, replace fabric softener and dryer sheets. They speed up drying time, reduce energy costs, and leave clothes fluffy and static-free. A brand of wool dryer balls is available on Amazon.

articles.title: Unveiling the Perfect Smart TV Under ₹1 Lakh: TCL's QD Mini LED Stands Out
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: TCL has introduced its QD Mini LED TVs, targeting the under ₹1 lakh segment. These smart TVs feature Premium QD Mini LED technology for vibrant visuals, Google TV for enhanced usability, a 144Hz refresh rate, and Dolby Atmos audio. TCL aims to offer a compelling alternative for budget-conscious consumers seeking quality viewing experiences.

articles.title: Sky is giving away a free Samsung tablet worth £259 - what to do to get yours
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Sky is offering a free Galaxy Tab A9+ with the purchase of a Galaxy S25 smartphone on contract. Samsung is also giving away the Tab A9+ with its S25 and offering discounts for trade-ins. Amazon is promoting Donerton Wireless Earbuds as a budget-friendly alternative to Apple's AirPods.

articles.title: ‘I'll not settle until I find it' cry cleaning fans as Zoflora releases brand new summer scent that ‘smells divine'
articles.author: Paige Beresford
articles.summary: Zoflora has launched a new, limited-edition summer scent called "Golden Sands," described as a radiant, sun-kissed fragrance with watermelon, apple, coconut, and vanilla blossom notes. The product is exclusively available at Home Bargains, and shoppers have expressed excitement over its launch and scent.

articles.title: ‘I'll not settle until I find it' cry cleaning fans as Zoflora releases brand new summer scent that ‘smells divine'
articles.author: Paige Beresford
articles.summary: Zoflora has launched a new limited-edition summer scent called Golden Sands. This fragrance, described as a sun-kissed blend of sunshine and fruity tones, is exclusively available at Home Bargains stores and online. The scent has top notes of watermelon and apple, with a base of coconut and vanilla blossom.

articles.title: Ghana Partners with UAE to Launch Innovation and Technology Hub
org: Ministry of Communication, Digital Technology, and Innovations
Dubai Ports, Customs and Free Zone Corporation
Ghana-India Kofi Annan Centre of Excellence in ICT
articles.summary: Ghana and the UAE have partnered to launch the Ghana-UAE Innovation and Technology Hub. Supported by companies like Telecel Ghana and MTN Ghana, the hub aims to promote innovation, attract investment, and create jobs in Ghana's digital and technological sectors.

articles.title: When multiple generations embrace heritage brands, it's a celebration of branding
articles.author: Karen V. De Asis
articles.summary: Louis Vuitton will open a new luxury hotel in 2026 at 103 Champs Elysees, Paris. The hotel will feature a gigantic LV-monogrammed trunk shape and represents an extension of the Louis Vuitton brand into the hotel and travel industry.

articles.title: I tried Schweppes' new bright purple product & found its appearance misleading
articles.author: Senior Reporter
articles.summary: Schweppes has launched a new product called Tropical Soda, a bright purple drink made with hibiscus and guava. The drink is described as fruity, floral, refreshing, and delicious both on its own and as a mixer with gin, and it retails for £1.75 per litre bottle.

articles.title: I tried Schweppes' new bright purple Tropical Soda & found its appearance misleading
articles.author: Aimee Seddon
articles.summary: Schweppes launched Tropical Soda, a purple-colored drink made with hibiscus and guava. The drink is described as fruity, floral, refreshing, and suitable as a mixer or on its own. It offers an interesting new flavor profile.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 vs Tecno Pop 9: Which budget smartphone to buy in 2025
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Lava has launched new smartphones under the Bold series, including the Lava Bold N1 and Lava Bold N1 Pro, targeting budget-conscious buyers with a starting price of Rs.5999. The Lava Bold N1 features a 6.75-inch HD+ display, a 13MP AI dual camera setup, and is powered by the octa-core Unisoc processor.

articles.title: 10 Press Releases You Need to See This Week
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Pizza Hut launched its first-ever BOOK IT! App designed to engage children in reading over the summer. Spirit Airlines rolled out a refreshed inflight menu with 12 new items. Sony Electronics introduced the FX2 Compact Camera to expand its Cinema Line versatility.

articles.title: Next shoppers say they've found the 'perfect' Father's Day gift for £20
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: Next is selling "The Well Groomed Essentials Box" for £20 as a Father's Day gift. The box contains seven grooming products worth over £77, including items from Percy Nobleman, BBW, Emma Hardie, Hawkins and Brimble, Dr Paw Paw, Mo Bros, and This Works.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans rushing to buy new beauty dupes in middle aisle from just €3.49
articles.author: Hannah Keegan
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland is launching new beauty dupes starting at €3.49 in their middle aisle, with the Lacura range hitting stores on June 5th.  New products include perfumes, lip balms (a dupe for Rhode), hydrating facial mists, and hair care essentials, with some products being dupes for luxury brands, offering substantial savings.

articles.title: Would you bathe in Sydney Sweeney's bathwater? The H! Fashion team weighs in
articles.author: Lauren Ramsay
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch launched 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss,' a limited-edition soap made with Sydney Sweeney's bathwater. The product was announced on Instagram and will be available on June 6, 2025, at drsquatch.com. The inspiration was fans requesting Sweeney's bathwater after a previous Dr. Squatch ad.

articles.title: Realme Neo7 Turbo Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Realme officially announced the Realme Neo7 Turbo on May 29, 2025. The 5G smartphone features a Si/C Li-Ion 7200 mAh battery with 100W wired charging, a 6.8-inch AMOLED display, and is powered by a Mediatek Dimensity 9400e processor running Android 15 with Realme UI 6.0. The phone comes with a dual rear camera setup (50MP + 8MP) and a 16MP front camera.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion Available For Under Rs 12,000 On Flipkart: Here's How To Get The Deal
articles.author: Shubham Arora
articles.summary: Motorola's Edge 60 Fusion, launched in April 2025, is now available at a discounted price on Flipkart. The phone boasts features like a quad-curved display, rugged build, AI-powered software, and camera system with 50MP Sony LYTIA 700C main camera, and is now available with offers like Axis Bank Credit Card discount and exchange program on Flipkart.

articles.title: Aiper Launches Global Strategic Hub in Singapore Following USD 100 Million Strategic Investment from Fluidra  May. 30, 2025 09:35
articles.summary: Aiper and Fluidra have formed a strategic partnership with a USD 100 million investment to advance Aiper's core technologies and accelerate the development of its smart backyard ecosystem. This collaboration will allow Aiper to expand into new regions while deepening its presence in existing markets, with the goal of providing customers with smart, effortless outdoor living experiences.

articles.title: ChatGPT: the next major shift in online grocery shopping
articles.author: George Nott
articles.summary: OpenAI has updated ChatGPT to include product recommendations and purchasing options for supermarket shopping.  This new functionality allows users to receive suitable recipes and purchasing options from online stores directly within the ChatGPT interface. OpenAI is also exploring direct product feeds from merchants to ChatGPT.

articles.title: Aldi is selling a handy gadget that's £70 cheaper than Karcher perfect for getting your garden ready for summer
articles.author: Daniel Fessahaye
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the FERREX Small Pressure Washer, priced at £49.99, as part of its Specialbuys range. The pressure washer features a 1400W motor, 110 bar pressure, and includes attachments like a high-pressure hose and spray gun. It will be available online and in stores starting June 5.

articles.title: Shoppers rave over 'best dry shampoo ever' that gives you extra days between hair washes
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: Oribe introduces the Serene Scalp Oil Control Dry Shampoo Powder, a powder-based dry shampoo designed to refresh hair by absorbing oil, dirt, and product buildup while promoting a healthier scalp. K18 also offers a liquid dry shampoo spray as an alternative to powder-based products.

articles.title: Top supermarket is selling a £2.49 dupe that ‘smells exactly' like £23 L'Occitane hand cream
articles.author: Caron McKinlay
articles.summary: Lidl introduced D'avignon Shea Hand Cream, a dupe of L'Occitane's Shea Butter Intense Hand Balm, priced at £2.49. Lidl also offers D'avignon hand and body liquid soaps in rose and lavender scents, reminiscent of L'Occitane's soaps, for £2.99 each.

articles.title: Fashionistas are legging it to a major supermarket middle aisle to snap up a gorgeous summer jumpsuit for just £6
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Lidl has introduced a new clothing range featuring a £5.99 jumpsuit, available in multiple colors and made with recycled material. This new line is available in Lidl stores and has gained popularity on social media.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney's Bathwater Soap: Celeb Beauty Trend? – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney launched 'Bathwater Bliss' soap, which is infused with water from her bath. This product launch highlights the commodification of personal data. The product is a data-gathering exercise, providing Dr. Squatch with insights into their customer base and Sweeney with a deeper understanding of her appeal.

articles.title: Amazon confirms hiring Xbox co-creator J Allard to lead new product invention team
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Amazon has created a new team called ZeroOne, led by J Allard, to invent 'breakthrough' consumer products, focusing on both hardware and software. Job postings suggest ZeroOne might be working on a 'new smart-home product' utilizing computer vision techniques and creating entirely new product categories. The team is comprised of individuals with experience in technologies like Alexa, Luna, and Halo sleep tracker.

articles.title: This new $650 Dyson hairstyler cut 4 minutes from my morning routine. Here's how
articles.author: WOO JI-WON
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Airwrap Co-anda 2x, a new multi-hair styler, initially exclusively in Korea. This updated model boasts a more powerful motor, enhanced airflow, and design improvements, including new attachments like the AirSmooth 2x designed to straighten hair. The Airwrap Co-anda 2x also features 2x glass bead thermistors to prevent heat damage.

articles.title: X-Origin AI Introduces Yonbo: The Next-Gen AI Companion Robot Designed for Families
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: X-Origin AI launched Yonbo, a smart AI companion robot designed for families, on Kickstarter on May 22, 2025. Yonbo features emotional intelligence, personalized interaction, multimodal AI, and diverse content for a redefiend companionship. The robot utilizes edge-side model control system to deliver personalized assistance and is designed to understand and respond to human emotions.

articles.title: X-Origin AI Introduces Yonbo: The Next-Gen AI Companion Robot Designed for Families
articles.author: X-Origin
articles.summary: X-Origin AI launched Yonbo, its first AI companion robot, on Kickstarter. Yonbo aims to provide lifelong companionship by offering an intelligent companion ecosystem powered by personalized AI models for users across all life stages.

articles.title: X-Origin AI Introduces Yonbo: The Next-Gen AI Companion Robot Designed for Families
articles.summary: X-Origin AI has launched Yonbo, a smart AI companion robot designed for families with children, on Kickstarter on May 22, 2025. Yonbo features emotional intelligence, personalized interaction, multimodal AI, and diverse content, setting it apart from other AI robots. The company envisions a full-scenario product line for all ages with its personalized AI models.

articles.title: Huawei Nova Y73 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Huawei officially announced the Nova Y73 on May 28, 2025. This budget smartphone features a Si/C Li-Ion 6620 mAh battery with 40W wired and 5W reverse wired charging, and it is available in Blue and Black. The device includes a 6.67-inch IPS LCD, Kirin 710A processor, 8GB RAM, and a 50-megapixel main camera.

articles.title: 'Elden Ring Nightreign' Gets Day One Patch With Key Fixes and Gameplay Tweaks
articles.author: Rob Le Febvre
articles.summary: Namco Bandai launched the 'Elden Ring: Nightreign' DLC with a day-one patch available on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam. The patch aims to improve gameplay and stability across all platforms.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3 Will Be Very Different From Phone 1, Phone 2, Here's How
articles.author: Priya Pathak
articles.summary: Nothing plans to launch Nothing Phone (3) in July and this model will not have Glyph Interface. The company CEO revealed that the phone could be priced around £800 and the sales are most likely to happen in collaboration with e-commerce company Flipkart.

articles.title: Samsung's new phone is skinny and light. That's come with some compromises
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new smartphone that prioritizes a thin and lightweight design. The S25 Edge features a 6.7-inch HDR OLED display, a 200MP main camera (same as S25 Ultra), and IP68 dust/water resistance, but compromises on zoom lens and battery life to achieve its slim profile.

articles.title: 농심, 창립 60주년 맞이 ‘히스토리 패키지' 한정 출시..'황금 10돈 찾아라'
articles.summary: Nongshim is launching a limited-edition 'History Package' featuring redesigned packaging for its main ramen products, including Shin Ramyun, Chapagetti, Ansungtangmyun, and Neoguri, to celebrate its 60th anniversary. The 'History Package' contains multiple product designs from the past until the current version of the product. The products will be available for approximately two months.

articles.title: Best Fragrances for the Modern Gentleman
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: The article discusses the importance of fragrance in modern masculine style, mentioning SRK Perfume for its bold character and exploration of luxury perfumes for men. It focuses on understanding fragrance as essential for mastering modern masculine style and choosing scents that reflect personality.

articles.title: Best Fragrances for the Modern Gentleman
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: The article discusses the importance of fragrance for modern gentlemen and mentions specific products like SRK Perfume and luxury perfumes for men. It emphasizes choosing fragrances that reflect personal style and enhance presence.

articles.title: Pamper Your Hands: Shop These Nourishing Hand Creams on Myntra's End of Reason Sale – Live from 30th May
articles.summary: New hand creams are available: a caramel popcorn cream for dry hands, a lightweight cream with floral notes, and a British rose essence hand cream for deep hydration. These products aim to moisturize, improve skin elasticity, and leave hands feeling refreshed and non-greasy.

articles.title: Shopee 6.6 Lagi Murah Sale: Up to 66% Off on Daily Essentials
articles.author: Shopee
articles.summary: Shopee is launching its 6.6 Lagi Murah Sale from June 1st to 9th, offering up to 66% off on daily essentials. The sale includes RM6 Knockout Deals from top brands and daily Free Shipping Vouchers with no minimum spend.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney Bathwater Soap: Fans Go Wild – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney has launched a new product, "Bathwater Soap", which is reportedly infused with her actual bathwater. The product's launch has generated significant buzz and mixed reactions, with discussions focusing on its novelty, ethical implications, and marketing strategy. Details regarding pricing, ingredients and availability for this premium product have not been widely publicized.

articles.title: Nvidia Geforce Now is officially available on Steam Deck
articles.summary: Nvidia officially launched its GeForce Now app on Steam Deck, providing access to a 2,200 game library. The service offers benefits like 4K resolution at 60FPS, HDR10, DLSS4, and Reflex on supported titles, enhancing the gaming experience beyond the Steam Deck's native capabilities.

articles.title: Final Recipient Announced As Round Two Of Innovation Fund Opens
articles.author: Scoop
articles.summary: Tend's new service is expected to deliver more than 15,000 [units unspecified, implying quantity of the service delivered].

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney releases soap infused with her own bathwater, fans react: ‘Thanks, I'll take 100'
articles.author: Entertainment Desk
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch, in collaboration with Sydney Sweeney, launched a limited-edition soap called "Sydney's Bathwater Bliss." The soap is claimed to be infused with Sydney Sweeney's bathwater. This product was created because of fan demand following a previous Dr. Squatch advertisement featuring Sweeney.

articles.title: LG Enhances Home Entertainment Across the Region With 2025 Ai-powered Oled and Qned Tv Lineup
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its 2025 OLED and QNED TV lineup in May, featuring advanced AI technology for enhanced picture and sound quality. These TVs include AI Picture Pro, Dynamic Tone Mapping Pro, and AI Sound Pro, offering personalized content recommendations and seamless smart home integration through ThinQ and Google Home.

articles.title: Sharp Unveils New AQUOS Smartphones with Generative AI Features
articles.summary: Sharp will release new AQUOS smartphone models in late June, featuring generative AI. The high-end model includes functions like automatic phone conversation transcription and AI-powered shadow removal from images. Sharp aims to expand AI application to deliver value to users.

articles.title: 货量曝光！AJ5 新联名恐怕不便宜！
articles.author: FLIGHTCLUB中文站
articles.summary: Awake NY and Air Jordan are launching a collaborative sneaker, the Awake NY x Air Jordan 5 'Arctic Pink', on August 16th. The sneaker pays homage to the OG 'Fire Red' color scheme with pink accents. The retail price is set at $210.

articles.summary: Olay launched the Super Serum Body Wash. Laneige introduced the Neo Blurring Powder. Loops launched the Quiet 2 ear plugs. Tree Hut restocked the Desert Haze Shea Sugar Scrub on Amazon. The Pink Stuff released the "Sqeezy" sponge set. BrüMate launched a leakproof handled tumbler. Clinique is promoting the Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey. Deli ProKeeper released the updated version of the wildly TikTok-viral original ProKeeper. E.l.f launched the Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. Arishine launched the Reusable Magnetic Eyeliner and Lashes Kit. Medicube launched the Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer. Catrice launched the "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener now in four shades!. Coop Home Goods is promoting "holy grail" pillow designed for side, back, and stomach sleepers. TruSkin launched vitamin C serum. Ninja launched portable Crispi Air Fryer system. Soft launched perfume rollerball. MagicMinerals launched AirBrush Foundation. Naked Sundays launched SPF 50+ Hydrating Glow Mist. Touchland launched Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer. Mixsoon launched Bean Essence. Levi's launched Ultra high-rise jeans. Eos launched Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion and Vanilla Cashmere Shave Oil. Tommie launched Tommie Cap-Sleeve Smocked Front-Zip Shirt Dress from Anthropologie. K18 launched Leave-In Molecular Hair Mask. Fellow launched electric kettle. Biodance launched Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask. Lumify launched Eye Drops. Uniqlo launched Round Mini Shoulder Bag. I Dew Care launched Benzene-free, travel-friendly applicator of dry shampoo powder. Lululemon promotes Align Leggings. Hatch launched Restore 2. July launched carry-on suitcase. Glamnetic launched press-on nails.

articles.title: 新易盛：公司主营业务为光模块
articles.author: 每日经济新闻
articles.summary: New Easysight's (300502.SZ) primary business involves optical modules, supporting AI/ML clusters, cloud data centers, data communication, 5G wireless networks, telecommunications transmission, and fixed network access. The company closely monitors communication technology advancements and continuously researches new communication technology products to fulfill customer needs.

articles.title: Google's new AI-powered search has arrived
articles.author: New York Times Syndicate
articles.summary: Google is rolling out AI Mode, a new feature that complements its traditional search engine. The AI Mode aims to provide answers to more complex and specific questions by pulling data from various Google services. The article tests AI Mode for tasks like product research, highlighting its potential for online shopping and creating charts, such as for baby car seats.

articles.title: Samsung's skinny phone packs a surprising punch
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new smartphone in the S25 line, that prioritizes a thin design. The S25 Edge features a 6.7-inch HDR OLED display, a 200MP main camera, and an ultrawide lens but compromises on zoom capabilities and battery life to achieve a thickness of less than 6mm and a weight of around 160g.

articles.title: Samsung's skinny phone packs a surprising punch
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing the Galaxy S25 Edge, a phone focused on aesthetics and thinness, priced at $1850. While comparable to the S25 Ultra in display, performance, and photo quality, it compromises on zoom lens and battery life to achieve a thinner and lighter design.

articles.title: Volkswagen won't follow Mitsubishi, BYD, Toyota with mid-size hybrid SUVs
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: Volkswagen, according to Mr. Nidigallu, can offer the ID.4 Pro to buyers looking for an alternative powertrain. The ID.4 Pro has a compelling price point, range, and features.

articles.title: Google Lens integrates with YouTube Shorts for visual search
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: YouTube is launching Google Lens on its Shorts platform, allowing users to search for objects, landmarks, or products directly within videos. This beta feature will be available in the coming weeks and uses Google Lens' AI to provide search results overlaid on the video. A "Translate" option also lets users translate captions in-video.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney is selling soap infused with her ‘actual' bathwater… and we feel dirty just typing this
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch is launching a new product called 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss' soap bars in collaboration with Sydney Sweeney. The soap, featuring refreshing notes of pine, Douglas fir, earthy moss, and a touch of Sydney's bathwater, will be available for purchase at drsquatch.com on June 6 for $8.

articles.title: Amazon Launches a Powerful, Affordable New Blink Video Doorbell, but There's a Catch
articles.author: Blake Stimac
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new version of its Blink video doorbell, priced at $60. The updated doorbell features a new "head-to-toe" HD live view with a 1:1 aspect ratio, providing a fuller view of the area in front of the door.

articles.title: Aiper Launches Global Strategic Hub in Singapore Following USD 100 Million Strategic Investment from Fluidra
articles.summary: Aiper is launching a Global Strategic Hub in Singapore after receiving a USD 100 million investment from Fluidra to advance core technologies and develop its smart backyard ecosystem. Valvoline Global has been announced as an Official FIFA World Cup 26 Supporter, planning to offer fan experiences and promotions with retail partners.

articles.title: 27 Space-Saving Travel Products For Over-Packers
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of new travel products, including a wheeled carry-on bag, a digital luggage scale, packing cubes, a waterproof Kindle with extended battery life, and a compact travel stroller. Additionally, the article highlights Alleyoop's Pen Pal, a multi-functional makeup pen, and a Toptote hat clip designed for travel convenience.

articles.title: ALDI TO ARCADIA: New grocery store brings affordable shopping options to town
articles.author: Victoria Quevedo
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a new grocery store in Arcadia, Florida, scheduled to open on June 12. This store aims to provide affordable grocery options for residents, addressing a need for budget-friendly shopping in the community.

articles.title: X-Design Rolls Out New AI Background Generator To Streamline E-commerce Photography Workflow
articles.author: The Daily Star
articles.summary: X-Design, a company specializing in AI-powered solutions, launched new photo editing tools. The announcement was made on May 29, 2025, in Haymarket, NSW, Australia.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney is now selling soap infused with her actual bathwater
articles.author: NME
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney collaborated with Dr. Squatch to introduce a new product called "Sydney's Bathwater." This product is a handmade soap infused with Sydney Sweeney's bathwater, and was announced on social media.

articles.title: Introducing Borchi® Dragon Low VOC high-performance catalyst
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: Milliken & Company's Borchers coating additives brand has launched a new product offering that delivers outstanding drying performance.

articles.title: Dr Pepper Vanilla Float flavor returns to shelves for limited summer release
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Dr Pepper has reintroduced its Vanilla Float flavor for a limited time. The flavor was initially launched in 2014.

articles.title: Revolutionary Laundry Upgrade with No Detergent Change Needed
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: NANORISM WASH is a compact attachment that creates ultrafine 'Tornado Bubbles' to enhance cleaning performance. The product removes stains, reduces odors, and cleans washing machines by simply attaching to a standard hose, eliminating the need for tools or detergent changes. It features a durable brass design and leverages over 10 years of bubble technology.

articles.title: Elden Ring Nightreign Tips and Tricks
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: FromSoftware is launching Elden Ring Nightreign. Elden Ring Nightreign is a new action RPG.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s launching in India on June 5; Price and other key specs tipped online
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch its new compact mobile phone, the OnePlus 13s, in India next week. The OnePlus 13s is believed to be a rebranded version of the OnePlus 13T. Details about the phone's specifications and pricing are emerging.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 release date, price, games and everything else you need to know
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing for the launch of a new product (details not specified). The content focuses on anticipating this upcoming release.

articles.title: LG Enhances Home Entertainment Across the Region With 2025 Ai-powered Oled and Qned Tv Lineup
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its groundbreaking 2025 home entertainment products, marking a significant advancement in the industry.

articles.title: This Chatbot Promises to Help You Get Over That Ex Who Ghosted You
articles.author: The Daily Blog
articles.summary: Closure, a startup, launched an AI-powered chatbot service designed to help users find closure from being 'ghosted.' The service allows users to roleplay conversations with AI versions of exes, friends, or recruiters. The chatbot is available in open beta and aims to provide a safe space for users to process their emotions.

articles.title: The Surprising Ways AI Is Reshaping Your Favorite Brands
articles.author: Kathleen Walch
articles.summary: AI is transforming CPG brands' product development by simulating formulations quickly, optimizing flavor profiles, and improving packaging. AI also optimizes supply chain operations by analyzing demand, mapping efficient delivery routes, and predicting bottlenecks. Additionally, AI personalizes customer engagement through tailored promotions and real-time sentiment analysis.

articles.title: The Glenrothes 51 Year Old And The Death Of Whisky As We Knew It
articles.author: Mark Littler
articles.summary: The Glenrothes has launched a 51 Year Old whisky, priced at $46,500, with unique Jesmonite casing which needs to be smashed open to access the bottle. This release highlights the shift in modern whisky culture towards symbolism and ownership, rather than solely focusing on the liquid itself.

articles.title: PowerWash Simulator Gets Final Major Update
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: FuturLab released the last major content update for PowerWash Simulator.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Pre-Orders Live: Not Long Till Launch Day, With Amazon & Very Stock ...
articles.author: Empire
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 pre-orders are now live, with Amazon and Very experiencing fast stock depletion. The launch day is approaching, and the console can be pre-ordered from available retailers.

articles.title: BuySellShrimp.com Launches as New Online Marketplace for Freshwater Shrimp Enthusiasts After eBay Policy Shakeup
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A dedicated online marketplace for buying and selling live freshwater shrimp and related supplies officially launched in the United States. The platform addresses the needs of freshwater shrimp hobbyists and breeders.

articles.title: For Today Only, Get Your Hands on This Roomba Robot Vacuum for Just $100
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: iRobot is offering its Roomba vacuum at a new, limited-time low price.

articles.summary: Mizuno has launched its brand new DP World Tour Truck, which is a purpose-built vehicle.

articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Elden Ring Nightreign launched today and is experiencing a strong start on Steam.

articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A new vacuum product with an AirLOC feature outperforms Shark and Dyson vacuums, leaving carpets pristine and effectively cleaning edges. This vacuum surpasses competitors in overall cleaning performance.

articles.title: Cheech & Chong's Cannabis Co. Reinvents Weed Culture - Now with Verified Potency and Direct-to-Consumer Access
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: Cheech & Chong launched a premium cannabis brand. The brand focuses on verified potency and transparent sourcing. The brand also offers nationwide direct-to-consumer access.

articles.title: YANSEN Launches Next-Gen Enterprise SSDs: Redefining High-Performance Storage Solutions
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: YANSEN introduced a new series of Enterprise SSD storage solutions. These storage solutions combine performance, reliability, and security. The new product aims to meet demanding workloads across industries.

articles.author: Victoria Advocate
articles.summary: S'ABLE Labs launched its first lip product, 'No Lip Service.' This launch was accompanied by a related offering on Spotify.

articles.title: Google opens storefront in Austin, seventh in world
articles.author: Austin American-Statesman
articles.summary: Google has opened its seventh retail store and first in Austin, located at the Domain Northside. The store offers Google products, technology, and merchandise for sale and testing, including AI assistance Gemini Live. The store will demonstrate features like camera or AI capabilities on digital phones.

articles.title: Elden Ring Nightreign Surpasses 2 Million Digital Sales and Worldwide Shipments
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: FromSoftware and Bandai Namco Entertainment have launched Elden Ring Nightreign for Xbox Series X/S, PS5, PS4, PC, and Xbox One. The game has already surpassed two million worldwide shipments and digital sales since its launch.

articles.title: Opera launches AI browser that codes websites and games for you
articles.author: Your Story
articles.summary: Opera has introduced Opera Neon, a new AI browser. Opera Neon can code websites and games using simple prompts.

articles.title: 'Trump Burger' Gets Scathing Reviews From Food Critics: 'Bland'
articles.author: Newsweek
articles.summary: Trump Burger opened a new outlet in Houston earlier this month. This represents the launch of a new location for the restaurant chain.
